<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get Tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/content/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get and filter existing tags.

You can find more information about tags [here](../../docs/guides/content/tags).

### Locale
Tags can have multiple translations for `name` and `description`.
You can specify a `locale` to get the corresponding translation.

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

  id={"request"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
